skill.name: Way of the Hundred Fists
skill.description:
Generate: 12 Spirit per attack

Unleash a rapid series of punches that strike enemies for 190% weapon damage as Physical.
skill.simpleDescription:
Generate: 12 Spirit per attack

Strike groups of enemies with a series of devastating punches.

rune.name: Assimilation
rune.description: Each enemy hit with the third hit increases your damage by 5% for 5 seconds.
rune.simpleDescription: Each enemy hit with the third hit increases your damage.

skill.name: Exploding Palm
skill.description:
Cost: 40 Spirit

Cause an enemy to Bleed for 1200% weapon damage as Physical over 9 seconds. If the enemy dies while bleeding, it explodes and deals 2770% weapon damage as Physical damage to all nearby enemies.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 40 Spirit

Strike and Bleed an enemy. The enemy will explode if killed while bleeding.

rune.name: Impending Doom
rune.description: Exploding Palm no longer causes the enemy to bleed, but if the enemy dies while affected by Exploding Palm, they explode for 6305% weapon damage as Cold.
rune.simpleDescription: Exploding Palm no longer causes the enemy to bleed, but if the enemy dies while affected by Exploding Palm, they explode for massive Cold damage.

skill.name: Seven-Sided Strike
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Dash rapidly between nearby enemies, dealing 5677% weapon damage over 7 strikes.

This ability does not start its cooldown until after its effects expire.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Move with blinding speed and strike nearby enemies while being immune to attacks yourself.

This ability does not start its cooldown until after its effects expire.

rune.name: Sustained Attack
rune.simpleDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Seven-Sided Strike.

skill.name: Cyclone Strike
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Pull up to 16 enemies within 24 yards towards you, followed by a furious blast of energy that deals 261% weapon damage as Holy.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Mystical force pulls nearby enemies towards you and blasts them.

rune.name: Wall of Wind
rune.description:
Enemies are Frozen for 1.5 seconds after being pulled in.

Cyclone Strike's damage turns into Cold.
rune.simpleDescription:
Enemies are Frozen after being pulled in.

Cyclone Strike's damage turns into Cold.

skill.name: Mantra of Salvation
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: You and nearby allies gain an additional 20% increased resistance to all elements for 3 seconds.

Passive: You and your allies within 60 yards gain 20% increased resistance to all elements.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: You and nearby allies gain greatly increased resistance to all elements.

Passive: You and nearby allies gain increased resistance to all elements.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.

rune.name: Agility
rune.description: Passive: Mantra of Salvation also increases Dodge Chance by 35%.
rune.simpleDescription: Passive: Mantra of Salvation also increases Dodge Chance.

skill.name: Dashing Strike
skill.description:
Cost: 1 Charge

Quickly dash up to 50 yards, striking enemies along the way for 370% weapon damage as Physical.

You gain a charge every 8 seconds and can have up to 2 charges stored at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 1 Charge

Quickly dash and strike enemies.

You gain a charge every 8 seconds and can have up to 2 charges stored at a time.

rune.name: Blinding Speed
rune.description:
Gain 40% increased chance to Dodge for 4 seconds after using Dashing Strike.

Dashing Strike's damage turns into Cold.
rune.simpleDescription:
Gain increased chance to Dodge after using Dashing Strike.

Dashing Strike's damage turns into Cold.

skill.name: Near Death Experience
skill.description:
When receiving fatal damage, you instead restore 35% Life and 35% Spirit and are immune to damage and control impairing effects for 2 seconds.

This effect may occur once every 60 seconds.
skill.flavor: "We do not see what has been done, we only see what remains to be done." —Mantra of the Monks of Ivgorod

skill.name: Beacon of Ytar
skill.flavor: It is only through hardship that we come to know our limits, and only through knowing our limits that we learn to shatter them.

skill.name: Mythic Rhythm
skill.description: Every third hit from a Spirit Generator increases the damage of your next damaging Spirit Spender by 40%.
skill.flavor: "The spirit is inconquerable, it folds in upon itself, it grows, always strengthening." — Patriarch Anisim

skill.name: Harmony
skill.description: 40% of your single elemental resistances from items instead increases your resistance to all elements.
skill.flavor: Ice hunters brave months of frozen darkness. Desert traders bear relentless, scorching sun. This world is ours to endure.

mainHand.name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

skill.name: Heal
skill.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar for 193112 Life.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar.

skill.name: Loyalty
skill.description: Regenerates 6437 Life per second for you and the Templar.
skill.simpleDescription: Provides Life regeneration for you and the Templar.

skill.name: Charge
skill.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges a target, dealing 280% weapon damage and stunning all enemies within 8 yards for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges an enemy, dealing damage and stunning nearby enemies.

skill.name: Inspire
skill.description:
Increases your resource generation.

Mana: 7 per second.
Hatred: 1 per second.
Wrath: 1.1 per second.
Arcane Power: 1.4 per second.
Fury: 10% generated.
Spirit: 10% generated.
